executionFiles.name: vpl_run.sh
executionFiles.contents:
#!/bin/bash
. common_script.sh
check_program gcc
get_source_files c
eval gcc -fsanitize=address -Wuninitialized -Wparentheses -Wreturn-type -Werror \n         -fno-diagnostics-color -o vpl_execution $SOURCE_FILES -lm -lutil
